channel.description: Resources Slides Operating System on Wikipedia Types of Operating Systems on Geeks for Geeks Understanding Operating Systems on GCF LearnFree GNU/Linux Naming Controversy on Wikipedia The Great Debate: Is it Linux or GNU/Linux? on How-To Geek Video Script Welcome to the first module in this class! Module 1 is all about creating secure workstations. In this module, you’ll learn how to install virtual machine software, install the operating systems we’ll be using in the class, and then configure several aspects of the operating systems. You’ll create users, manage file permissions, install software, and secure those systems.
